scripts.build: npm run prisma:generate && tsc && npm run copy:static
scripts.vercel-build: bash scripts/vercel-migrate.sh && tsc && npm run copy:static
scripts.copy:static: copyfiles -u 0 index.html script.js styles.css public && copyfiles -u 0 'admin/**/*' public && copyfiles -u 0 'assets/**/*' public
scripts.start: npm run migrate:deploy && npm run validate:db && node dist/server.js
scripts.migrate:deploy: bash scripts/smart-migrate.sh || echo 'Migration script not found, skipping...'
scripts.validate:db: ts-node scripts/validate-db.ts || node dist/scripts/validate-db.js || echo 'Database validation skipped'
